Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
18.12.2013 SH SCR18565 Adjusted argument list for ODHC01
22.07.2013 SH SCR18300 Extended again test (*5*), removed test on GNRL_CODE=PL to handle messages as error
13.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
11.09.2012 GB SCR17562 Extended test (*5*) with V.SELECT = true and ...
27.04.2012 SH SCR17281 Task "Read Invoives/Create TEMPFILE" --> Added test INVO_CURRENCY = BTCP_CURRENCYACC in case of
CLUP_PAYMENTSONMULTIPLEDEBT = 'Y' invoice selection
23.04.2012 SH SCR17244 Task "Read Invoives/Create TEMPFILE" --> Changed whole selection to DSQL
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
01.10.2011 GB SCR16685 Changed mask of invoice number (10 -> 20)
04.07.2011 SH SCR16510 Added test "New invoice amount will be larger as
current invoice amount"
12.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
25.03.2011 SH SCR16300 Added button Remark
01.03.2011 SH SCR16238 Added new admin currency logic (removed GNRL_CURRENCY)
17.01.2011 SH SCR16144 Present Invoice amount in bold if INVO_CURRENCY <>
15.10.2010 SH SCR15873 Removed ForceRecordSuffix expression in online task and
moved access of DCRM to higher level (performance issues)
13.09.2010 SH SCR15801 Added test "Not allowed to change the administration
number of the draft" (Message ID = PH0314)
11.03.2010 SH SCR15368 Removed test "DEBC_RFMFCOSTS_CLNTNO > 0 ..." in part
where the invoices are selected (only relevant if CLUP_PAYMENTSONMULTIPLEDEBT
14.12.2009 SH SCR15164 Added message "Direct payment" if GSET_PAYMENTCODE(317)
> 0 and BTCP_RCVDFROMCLIENT = Y
16.09.2009 SH SCR14902 Removed parameter PI.SPLITTED_AMOUNT and fields
from screen regarding the spitted payment amount
17.07.2009 AK SCR14746 added tags for lefal debtors and not approachable debtors
16.06.2009 AK SCR14695 added new button ' CredMan'
17.02.2009 SH SCR14415 Added client upfront handling (diff. selection of INVO)
22.10.2008 SH SCR14060 Added FCI handling regarding to test "Client not allowed
for this curency"
02.10.2008 SH SCR13995 Skipped changing BTCP variables if coming back from
OPH202B5 and nothing was changed
22.09.2008 GB SCR13955 Display Batch number in blue if BTCH_CODETYPEACCOUNT = 5
04.08.2008 SH SCR13853 Removed whole intercredit tests
19.05.2007 AK SCR13622 Extend the check on intercredit client (legal debtors)
21.05.2007 AK SCR12411 check only recently entered DEBTOR_CLIENT_REMARK
07.02.2007 SH SCR12289 Added GSET_YESNO = 'Y' (GSET_ID=124) to enable testings
if client is allowed for BTCP_CURRENCYCLNT
25.07.2006 SH SCR11623 Changed screen resolution form 800x600 to 1024x768 and
removed special handling for BPIV_VARIABLETEXT / INVO_AWKAI, both variables
are displayed now, see also SCR 8771 from 09.08.2005
21.07.2006 SH SCR11614 Added updates BTCP_ROWCHANGEDBYUSRID
19.05.2006 SH SCR10673 Changed test "Client not allowed for curency"
10.05.2006 SH SCR1113 Changed error message ""New invoice amount will be
negative" to be a warning message in case of GNRL_CODE <> 'PL'
18.04.2006 SH SCR10936 Added BPH111.PI.DISCOUNTCREDITNOTES = N
1. Extended test "Client not allowed for curency" with " or CLNT108_ACC_CURR <>
BTCP_CURRENCYCLNT
12.01.2006 SH SCR10003 Added new test "Client not allowed for curency" if
BTCH_BTCHCODE = cheques and client curency <> client currency of previous
entered / selected client
27.12.2005 SH SCR9913 Added special updates of V.NOWBOOKED with
INVO_AACTUALI - INVO_AWKAI, see SCR for more details
07.11.2005 SH SCR9432 Added new argument to program which check/store data
19.10.2005 SH SCR9301 Added new button "Debtor info"
13.10.2005 SH SCR9185 Changed handling for Allowed Discount and Not allowed
discount acoording to additional credit restriction handling
07.09.2005 SH SCR9004 Added new test "Client not allowed for this currency"
09.08.2005 SH SCR8771 Added new field on screen DEBC_WKAPERC and in case of
GNRL_CODE = "NL" INVO_AWKAI is displayed as variable text on screen
29.06.2005 SH SCR7753 Added test that is not allowed to enter/select legal
collection debtors if users have no permissions and GSET_YESNO=Y (76)
19.05.2005 SH SCR8315 Changed test on CLNT316_PAYMENTSONSPECADM = 'Y'
from ERROR to INFO
07.04.2005 SH SCR8081 Added new test on client, it's not allowed to use clients
where CLNT316_PAYMENTSONSPECADM = 'Y'
03.11.2004 SH SCR7286 Added test "New invoice amount will be nagative"
//28-10-2004 JP SCR #7328 add paramter in call to ODC005D 'ChangeInvoices'
15.09.2004 SH SCR6982 Added module to undo "Scanning prepare" actions if
BTCP_ANNEXECSTOSCAN was set from TRUE to FALSE (only if BTCP_HYPA_ID>0)
02.09.2004 SH SCR6943 Added new argument to call for OPH202B6
PI.PROGRAM_ID = 'OPH202B'
11.08.2004 SH SCR6760 Changed TNIP_AMOUNT to green colour to indicated that
this invoice is a credit note --> only performed in GNRL_CODE = 'PL'
29.07.2004 SH SCR6689 Extended selection of DEBC with DEBC_DATDELETED=NULL()
27.07.2004 SH SCR6544 Added task to delete TINP rows, will be called only if
DBDEL function for table TINP failed.
26.05.2004 SH SCR6284 Added INVU_FINALPAYMENTDATE = null() to check if
INVU rows exists, (f.i. if exists button "Unbooked fees" becomes red)
14.04.2004 SH SCR5708 Added new field TINP_INVO_TEXT to the bottom of the screen
14.04.2004 SH SCR4412 Enable field TINP_BPIV_VARIABLETEXT to modfifiable
07.04.2004SH SCR5905 Changed TNIP_AMOUNT to bule coloure to indicated that there
- was a partial payment; Added new button "Change invoices" ==> Call ODC005D
26.02.2004 EE SCR5511 new parameter for mainscreen
19.01.2004 SH SCR5309 Extended column TINP_INVOICE_NO
15.01.2004 SH SCR5035 Changed handling of totals of TINP_NOWBOOKED in
- INCO_CURRENCY, see SCR for details
13.01.2004 SH SCR5205 Removed changes from OPH202B regarding to SCR4412,
- specially BPIV_VARIABLETEXT which is not modifiable now
08.01.2004 SH SCR5230 Extended part of invoice notice, with the possibility to
- change invoice fileds, see SCR for details
05.01.2004 SH SCR5035 Added two new fields "Sum BPIV_AMOUNTCURRINV " and
- "BPIV_CURRENCY", see bottom in online task
09.12.2003 SH SCR5013 Extended message 'PH10151', see SCR for details
05.11.2003 SH SCR4659 Added new buttons "Invoice notes" and 'Dunning letters"
//24.10.2003 EE SCR32413 add paramter for ODC_MainScreen
09.10.2003 SH SCR4530 Added new button 'Locate'
08.10.2003 SH SCR4513 Display blank if INVO_DUEDATE = NULL() (means default
24.09.2003 RR SCR4412 Changed column 'Manual text' to modifiable = 'YES'
09.09.2003 SH SCR4295 Added new column "Due date"
08.09.2003 SH SCR4295 Added new button "Partial payment" and enable SORT on
- columns Invoice date, Invoice number and Invoice amount
20.08.2003 SH SCR4131 Set PI.BTCP_ANNEXESTOSCAN = BTCP_ANNEXESTOSCAN
- see task "Modify BTCP_ANNEXESTOSCAN", to allow multiple changes of this
- varibale, if the user switches the flag from TRUE to FALSE, then from FASLE to
- TRUE, ....
05.08.2003 SH SCR3778 Added test on CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT = 2,
- for new selected clients, then paymenthandling not allowed
31.07.2003 SH SCR3879 Changed only CenterScreenInOnline to 'Y' if default = 'N'
16.07.2003 SH Changed some descriptions
05.05.2003 SH SCR3394 Implemented check if there are invoices exists in the
- delcredere adminsitration, if TRUE give message
30.04.2003 SH SCR3414 Removed function "Split payment" implemented in OPH202A
- now.
09.04.2003 SH SCR3283 Start debtor search if "Name search" was pressed in
- OPS007
07.04.2003 SH SCR3283 The recalculation of amounts with GB002 will not
- executed if both currencies equal
23.03.2003 RR -> SCR3195 Implementation of shortcut handling
04.02.2003 SH SCR2918 Changed checkbox handling according to the new SP5 option
03.02.2003 SH SCR2782 Cleanup source code
10.12.2002 SCR2637 SH Changed sort of invoices to INVOICENO/INVDATE
06.11.2002 SCR2450 SH If the temp. table TINP will be created the TINP_INVOICE
- AMOUNT has to be minimized with already booked parts of the invoice with other
- payments
05.11.2002 SCR2469 SH Give error if user wanted to changed the client and the
- client is an intercredit client
19.08.2002 SH Use the DATE() instead of BTCH_DATE as argument for GB002
13.08.2002 SH Removed call to OPH202D, will be now called from OPH201A
05.08.2002 Sh Add new arguments if OPH202B6 will be called
1. Move controls for total amounts below the correct columns
2. If OPH202B6 (Differenecs) will be called rebuild first the tmpe table TINP
to show the already booked/unbooked invoices in OPH202B6
3. Add new arguments to show debtor fields and total amounts if OPH202B6 called
4. We do not longer check for BTPC rows to get the ADMNI/CLNTNO/DEBH/DEBC
if there are already booked invoices/differences exist, to build the working
range for OPH202B.
5. If button OK was pressed and payment cloud not beclosed call OPH202B6 instead
of leaving OPH202B and go back to OPH202A
1. OPH202D --> if OPH202D (Individual Invoices) will be closed by user, we
will open OPH202B for the debtor, for which we entered the last invoice in
OPH202D --> Added four arguments if OPH202D will be called
2. OPH202C --> if OPH202C (Split payment) will be closed by user, we
will open OPH202B for the debtor, for which we entered the last invoice in
OPH202C --> Added one argument if OPH202C will be called
17.07.2002 SH Replaced column Admninistration against Invoicedate in onlineprog.
1. Enable button "Variable letters" if the difference between TINP_HANDLED and
TINP_NOWBOOKED <> 0, then BPIV rows exists to work with variable letters
- then BPIV rows exists to work with variable letters
2. Add new argument if OPH202B6 will be called --> "v.Remaining difference"
- if the difference = 0 the payment can be booked directly, leave OPH202B
3. Amountfields can be entered now with decimals --> use UFB547
1. SCR1563 Call ODHC01 Serach debtor with argument 6 = 'C', then the debtor
client search control will be activated auto in ODHC01.
2. If an invoice was selected for booking and the button "Variable text" was
pressed, after the physical updates, the temp. table TINP has to be reloaded
to get the BTPC/BPIV_LINNUM to call OPH202 B5
3. Program OPH202B_001 "Final Test" will be called now every time, if OK was
pressed, before we called this program only if something was changed in
OPH202B. Then we get a problem if the user changes something in the
special programs OPH202BX (f.e. Differences)
4. See point 3. Also the reset of BTCP_STATUS from 1 to 0 will be made every
time if button OK was pressed
1. SCR1508 Send new arguments to OPH202B6 --> v.SUM_ALLOWEDDISCOUNT,
v.SUM_NOTALLOWEDDISCOUNT, v.DIFFERENCE
2. Add new button "Payed invoices", show payed invoices for actual debtor client
3. Enable button "Differences" only if a differenece exist
10.04.2002 SH Changed call to ODHC01 --> new program
-- SCR#417 --> OK (It's possible to enter a debtorclient in OPH202A
and to leave the debtorheller blanc. For this case we added a LINK
to table DEBC to get the DEBH_NO. With this number we get the
relevant values from table DEBH, which are dispalyed on screen.)
-- SCR#421 --> OK (calculation of discount for invoices which were
already booked
-- SCR#419 --> (Display Invoiceamounts in BTCP-CURRENCYPAY)
-- SCR#415 --> (Search Invoice, new searchparameters)
-- SCR#422 --> (creditnotes now displayed)
-- SCR#416 --> OK 13.12.2001 (Search Debtor, new searchparameters)
-- SCR#553 --> OK 17.01.2002 (red rows, no confimation to save changes
-- SCR#747 --> OK 13.02.2002 (Call OPH202B4 with unique DEBC_NO)
-- Global variables (most of the global variables are fetched with LinkQuery in
the parts where they will use, but now the time was coming to fetch them at the
start of OPH202B, in the future the other LinkQuery(s) could be also moved
to task "GetGlobalvalues"), see SCR 9004 07.09.2005 SH
-- relevant to calculate the maximum difference in the Header PART 1
-- Shortcut labels
... get permissions to handle legal collection debtors
-- Shortcut handling
-- Test if there are invoices in the delcredere administration and give message
-- if TRUE
-- Need for program 'Final test', only when button OK was pressed
-- there would be check, if the payment can be closed
-- if the tempfile, see task below, is written, then the onlinetask is
-- open in 'M' Mode otherwise in 'Q' Mode
-- TRUE, when changes to table TINP were made, relevant to store
-- the changed values in table TINP after pressing Button OK
-- Only when v.Create TINP_PAYMENT_INVIOCE = TRUE, the tempfile
-- TINP_PAYMENT_INVOICES created new, if something was changed in the
-- additional programs
-- The four following virtuals are relevant for the Range to the table
-- invoice, build temporary file --> TINP_PAYMENT_INVOICES
-- v.actual Range_ADMNO can changed, by 'Other Debtor'
-- v.actual Range_CLNTNO can changed, by 'Other Debtor'
-- v.actual Range_DEBH can changed, by 'Other Debtor'
-- v.actual Range_DEBC can changed, by 'search other Debtor'
-- or 'Other debtor' or 'Search Invoices'
-- After search with an invoicenumber and selection of a row in OSP007
-- the invoice has to be auto. selected in table TINP
-- Output-Parameter for OPH202B6, if the difference = 0 the payment can be
-- booked directly
-- Virtuals relevant for Parameters to other programs
-- Get the unique DEBC_NO
-- Used to dispaly red retangle around button Debtor Info
-- Validations if client/debtor is changed in OPH202B, handling legal debtors
not allowed if users have no permissions
-- Get Name and City to debtor heller
-- Get new values from the selected Client
-- Validations if client changed in OPH202B
1. It's not allowed to select clients with END status
2. only INFO--> Payments for unknown invoices must be booked at another
administration
... uses virtual for GNRL_CODE to change code for testing purposes
-- Check, if there are unbooked fees exist in database, relevant
to make Button 'Unbooked fees' red --> Check with separate task
-- Virtuals in screen footer
-- INFO: If all handled invoives (invoice selected or an amount was entered in
TINP_NOWBOOKED) have the same currency then the currency has to dispaly
at the bottom of the screen, otherwise the field has to be empty.
If the user unselected a line and the currency at the bottom is empty, because
invoices in diff. currencies were handled, then the curency at the bottom does
not change, because the logic becomes to complicate and will reduce
the performance
-- If virtual = 1 the debtor search secrren has to be started automatically
-- Is this program called from OPH202A, BTCP_ADMNO_INITIAL, BTCP_CLNTNO_INITIAL
-- BTCP_DEBH and BTPC_DEBC_DEBC will be used for actual range if programs was
-- started
-- Call ONLINE-TASK
-- Prepare TEMP_FILE for Online-Task
-- HEADERINFORMATIONS PART 1
-- CALCULATE the maximum difference
-- if CLNT312_MAXPERCENTAGE > 0
-- if CLNT312_MAXAMOUNT > 0
--End Block --> Call ONLINE-TASK
-- Check and save table TINP_PAYMENTS_INVOICES
-- If the payment was already handled, but modifications are required
-- the BTPC_STATUS and BTCH_TOTAPAYMENTSHANDLEDH must set
-- If payment could not be closed, call OPH202B6 (Difference) to book difference
-- Button 'Search debtor', 'Search invoice' or 'Other debtor' was
-- pressed
-- Button 'Unbooked fees' was pressed
-- Button 'Differences' was pressed
-- Rebuild temp table TINP to show the already booked/unbooked invoices/differen
-- in OPH202B6
-- Button 'Variable letters' was pressed
-- Button 'Change invoices' was pressed
--End Block --> Check and save table TINP_PAYMENTS_INVOICES
-- Button 'Unbooked fees' pressed
-- Button 'Differences' pressed
-- If the remaining difference in OPH202B6 was 0, then the payment can be booked
-- auto., leave OPH202B and go back to OPH202A
-- Button 'Variable letters' pressed
-- First create a new temp table TINP if an invoice was selected for booking to
-- get the BTPC/BPIV_LINNUM
-- Button 'Change invoices" pressed
-- If the payment was already handled, but modifications are required
-- the BTPC_STATUS and BTCH_TOTAPAYMENTSHANDLEDH must set
-- Exit Programm after pressing Button Cancel and doesen't check
-- and save entries
-- see remark in R.S.
-- Test, if there were any changes be done for one row,
relevant to check entries
-- Reset variables
-- Check for unbooked fees (use to make button 'Unbooked fees' red)
Set where clause to select INVU
... by default
...different selections of INVU regarding client upfront handing
-- If key 'Esc' pressed, ask for confirmation
-- If key 'Esc' pressed by USER or he starts an other program
-- directly over the menue out of this program, the following BLOCK
-- will be executed --> -- Ask USER for confirmation if he changed
-- data
-- Validations (not if user does not want to store changes)
... Warning: New invoice amount will be nagtive
-- Warning: New invoice amount will be larger as current invoice amount
-- Calculate totals, see bottom on screen
-- We can't use incremental funtion to calc totals, because
-- v.TINP_NOWBOOKED (INV_CURR) is a virtual not a real and then incremental
-- does not work properly
-- Checking a Line (TINP_SELECT = TRUE) and TINP_HANDELD = 0
-- and TINP_NOWBOOKED = 0
-- Update TINP_NOWBOOKED
-- Prepare variables to build totals of NOWBOOKED in INVO_CURRENCY
-- Set v.INVO_CURRENCY = INVO_CURRENCY, uses to display at the bottom of the
-- screen
-- Calculation of discount and credit restriction
-- Recalculations if invoice currency <> payment currency
... recalculation ALLOWED_DISCOUNT
... recalculation NOT_ALLOWED_DISCOUNT
... recalculation ALLOWED_CREDRESTR
... recalculation NOT_ALLOWED_DISCOUNT
-- Checking a Line (TINP_SELECT = TRUE) and TINP_HANDELD <> 0
-- and TINP_NOWBOOKED = 0
-- Prepare variables to build totals of NOWBOOKED in INVO_CURRENCY
-- Unchecking a Line (TINP_SELECT = FALSE) and TINP_NOWBOOKED <> 0
... prepare variables to build totals of NOWBOOKED in INVO_CURRENCY
-- If a screenrefresh was executed jump back to last field on which the
-- cursor parked, not if the checkbox was selected
-- Only execute if amountfileds entered directly, not if checkbox was selected
-- Prepare variables to build totals of NOWBOOKED in INVO_CURRENCY
-- Set v.INVO_CURRENCY = INVO_CURRENCY, uses to display at the bottom of the
-- If the USER changes manually TINP_NOWBOOKED, then
TINP_HANDLED + TINP_NOWBOOKED = 0, and TINP_HANDLED <> 0
and TINP_NOWBOOKED <> 0
-- Update TINP_NOWBOOKED via extra task to achieve processing of R.S. (does not
work if variable is updated in handler
-- Prepare variables to build totals of NOWBOOKED in INVO_CURRENCY
... New invoice amount will be nagtive
... only if GNRL_CODE = 'PL' it's an error, elso only a warning
-- New invoice amount will be larger as current invoice amount
... only if GNRL_CODE = 'PL' it's an error, elso only a warning
... update virtrual variable, to achieve recompute of LinkQuery DCRM in parent
-- Update v.BTCP_BADP_ID to achieve a re-compute on BLHS after coming back from
OPH113, to show the red retangle around button "Remark"
-- Start auto. debtor search if button "Name search" was pressed in OSP007

ExpSyntax.val: VarMod ('{0,3}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,12}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,16}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,17}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,19}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,20}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,24}'VAR)

ExpSyntax.val: VarMod ('{4,3}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{4,12}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{4,16}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{4,19}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{4,24}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{4,35}'VAR)

Text.val: -- see remark in R.S.
-- Get data to init fields on screen
-- If the TEMP_BPH258 does not exists, get data to init fields on screen from
-- table INVO and INVA
-- If key 'Esc' pressed by USER or he starts an other program
-- directly over the menue out of this program, the following BLOCK
-- will be executed --> -- Ask USER for confirmation if he changed
-- data
-- Check and save entries
-- Reste trigger
-- Check entries
-- An error occured
-- No erros occured, store values to database
-- Exit without storing data
-- Exit with storing data
-- see remark in R.S.
-- If key 'Esc' pressed by USER --> Ask USER for confirmation if he changed
-- data
-- Exit without storing data
-- Exit with storing data

ExpSyntax.val: IF ({0,1},MlsTrans ('SCR[OPH202A]:Allowed Discount / credit restriction'),MlsTrans ('SCR[OPH202A]:Not allowed Discount / credit restriction'))

Text.val: -- Task in only used to achieve processing of R.S. in parent task if button
Partial payment is pressed
... if DBDEL of table TINP failed for whatever reason, then the table has to be
deleted row by row, otherwise dupicate keys will be produced.
This kind of problems only occured in PL.
-- Set where clause to select INVO in next step
... by default
...different selections on INVO regarding client upfront handing
-- Reset Virtuals
If there are > 1 different currencies leave field blank, see bottom in online
task, where value will be displayed
-- If the last record was deleted, it's not relevant to LOCATE on this record in
the online task, we don't want to see the message "Record not found,...."

SQL_STMT_U.val: select A.INVO_DEBC_NO, A.INVO_AACTUALI, A.INVO_ADMNO, A.INVO_CLNTNO, A.INVO_DEBH_NO, A.INVO_DEBC_DEBC, A.INVO_NO, A.INVO_INVOICENO, A.INVO_INVDATE, A.INVO_DUEDATE, A.INVO_CURRENCY, A.INVO_AINITIALI, A.INVO_MARKCODESPEC, A.INVO_TEXT, C.BPIV_BTPC_LINENO, C.BPIV_LINENO, C.BPIV_AMOUNTCURRPAY, C.BPIV_VARIABLETEXT, (select cast(sum(D.BPIV_AMOUNTCURRINV) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BPIV D where (D.BPIV_BTCH_ID <> :2 or D.BPIV_BTCP_LINENO <> :3) and D.BPIV_INVO_NO = A.INVO_NO and D.BPIV_CASHREPORTDATE is null) as NOTUPDATEDYET from :1/INVO A join :1/DEBC B on B.DEBC_NO = A.INVO_DEBC_NO and :4 left outer join :1/BPIV C on C.BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and C.BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = :3 and C.BPIV_INVO_NO = A.INVO_NO where A.INVO_AACTUALI<>0 :5 FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: -- reset virtuals
-- Recalculate invoice amount in payment currency
-- Additional UPDATES, when INVO_INVOICENO is one of the
invoice numbers which are entered on OPH202A or an Invoice_ID
was selected from the search screen for invoices
-- Direct select
-- Update TINP_NOWBOOKED
-- Caculation Payment_Booked in the Header
-- Additional UPDATES, when INVO_INVOICENO is one of the
invoice numbers which are entered on OPH202A or the invoice was
already booked, the discount has to be calculated
- Get discount and credit restrictions
-- Start recalculation if invoice currency <> payment currency
...recalculation ALLOWED_DISCOUNT
... recalculation NOT_ALLOWED_DISCOUNT
... recalculation ALLOWED_CREDRESTR
... recalculation NOT_ALLOWED_CREDRESTR
-- Caculation TOTALS in the FOOTER of the form
Build total for invoice curency, display at the bottom of the screen
If there are > 1 different currencies leave field blank
-- Only relevant if Button "Variable Letters" was pressed, we need the BTPC/BPIV
_LINNUM to make a RANGE in OPH202B5 if a invoice was selected but not finaly
booked
-- Read all existing BATCH_PAYMENT_INVOICES of the actual
payment, within the selected DEBC_DEBC and write them in the
TEMP_FILE. Additional we have to look, that there are no booked
invoices, related to the BATCH_PAYMENT_INVOICE.
This BATCH_PAYMENT_INVOICES are the DIFFERENCES and not
booked against an invoice.
-- Recalculation in payment currency, all amounts are dispalyed in
payment currency
-- Caculation TOTALS in the FOOTER of the form
-- Only relevant if Button "Variable Letters" was pressed, we need the BTPC/BPIV
_LINNUM to make a RANGE in OPH202 B5 if a invoice was selected but not finaly
booked

record has to be created, because the USER can change in the

other debtor.
